ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Good move Dachande, I figured you d be smart enough to figure something out. With his computer recording Phobia doesn t hear any of the conversation going on

Good move Dachande, I figured you'd be smart enough to figure 
something out.

With his computer recording Phobia doesn't hear any of the 
conversation going on between Magmatron and Bobertron, he listens in 
for a moment just long enough to hear Shredder mention the Maximals. 
Phobia knows that Magmatron's got some scheme planned for him. simple 
logic states that Magmatron knows about the babies, and is doing 
nothing about them so he must be planning something to his advantage. 
It doesn't matter though, he's got his back covered by the Maximals 
and if he plays his cards right he'll have Predacons to watch his 
front. (He'd never trust a predacon with his back. He might get a 
knife in it.)


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Dachande85@a... wrote:
> ::Magmatron/Bobertron::
> 
>     "That insect will let us spy on the bot who is trying to spy on 
us." 
> Magmatron explained to Bobertron. "It will also infect all others 
of it's 
> kind with the same virus. So if he destroys all the spys in the 
base we will 
> have nothing to worry about, and if he doesn't...I give it five 
megacycles 
> before every bug in this place is under my control."
